subject: RE: [junit] contructor executed at each test method
msgSnippet: ... but then... also setUp() gets executed for every method, isn t it? why do we have setUp() for ? __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Read only
messageBody:
--- Ilja Preuss <preuss@...> wrote:

> radu milos wrote:
> > Hello ,
> >
> > As the subject says it, i found out that the
> > constructor of a testCase get executed for every
> test
> > method. Is this the normal behaviour ?
>
> Yes. That is the intended behaviour.
>
> Cheers, Ilja
>
>

but then... also setUp() gets executed for every
method, isn't it? why do we have setUp() for ?
